items.headline: U.S. stocks see shaky start to December in post-Thanksgiving ‘hangover’
items.summary_en: The U.S. stock market kicked off December in the red, with the S&P 500 off to a shaky start to the month after its big bounce last week erased its November losses.

items.headline: Here’s a new way to shave hundreds of dollars off your tax bill — but it might make you feel like Scrooge on Giving Tuesday
